biotools.summary: Predicts functional residues from structural templates and alignment reliability. It runs HHsearch and PSI-BLAST programs to generate alignments. Profiles are generated from a local 70% non-redundant database. Alignments are generated between the target sequences and FireDB templates.

bioschemas.name: firestar
